FuncDef: This command creates a template that can be referenced by a client application where dynamic LSP creation is required. The LSP template type (p2mp,one-hop-p2p,mesh-p2p,one-hop-p2p-srte,mesh-p2p-srteorpce-init-p2p-srte) is mandatory.
CLIs: lsp-template <template-name> [ mesh-p2p | mesh-p2p-srte | one-hop-p2p | one-hop-p2p-srte | p2mp | pce-init-p2p-srte template-id { default | template-id } ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of the LSP template, up to 32 characters. An LSP template name and LSP name must not be the same.

ParaDef.Parameters: mesh-p2p | mesh-p2p-srte | one-hop-p2p | one-hop-p2p-srte | p2mp | pce-init-p2p-srte
ParaDef.Info: Identifies the type of LSP this template will signal.
Sets the template to be the default LSP template for PCE-initiated SR-TE LSPs.
Specifies the value that is signaled in the PCE to identify the LSP template.
